Posts.Content: Hi I am at the first stage of making plans for the Diep reconstruction bi-lateral. I have had 5 implant replacements and my body rejects them. Wave you gone to NOLA dr. Sullivan?
Posts.Title: Diep surgery, NOLA has anyone had the surgery and what was your out of pocket fees?

Posts.Content: Hello Deb, I have heard back from the clinic that I am a good candidate for the surgery. :) I also found out what my out of pocket amount will be, 6500.00. Not bad considering the amount of work and the stay in the hospital and all. I have met other women who have had Dr.'s Sullivan and his team and saw the results and felt the results. Absolutley amazing! I have had Bi-lateral mastectomy with implants, I have had them replaced 4 times in 4 years! I am so tired of having surgeries. I will hopefully get started with the preop requirements in a couple of weeks. I hear the weather is HOT in the summer and humid. I don't care I will be in airconditioned facility. Please keep in touch and we will share our success. I live in Oregon. I too will be traveling a long way. Rosalie
Posts.Title: Diep surgery, NOLA has anyone had the surgery and what was your out of pocket fees?

Posts.Content: Can someone tell me about the phase two DIEP Flap procedure? I know they make the nipples but is there some lipo suction also?
